entry.title: Combined summary - Testing Reply Structure
entry.summary:
This is a test thread with multiple levels of replies:
Alice started the conversation with an original post about testing thread functionality.
Bob replied to Alice with some feedback and questions about the implementation.
Charlie then responded to Bob's message with a deeper technical analysis of the threading system.
David provided another perspective directly to Alice's original post.
Finally, Eve responded to David's message with additional insights.
This thread structure should display as: - Alice (depth 0) - Original post ├─ Bob (depth 1) - Reply to Alice │ └─ Charlie (depth 2) - Reply to Bob └─ David (depth 1) - Another reply to Alice └─ Eve (depth 2) - Reply to David
